The randomized , double-blind , control 3-month study 5 centre 3 city China enrol 244 menopausal patient age 40 - 60 year Kupperman Menopause Index ( KMI ) equal 15 . The participant assign either iCR correspond 40 mg crude drug/day ( n=122 ) tibolone 2,5 mg/day ( n=122 ) orally . The primary endpoint combination Mann-Whitney value ( MWV ) KMI frequency adverse event ( benefit-risk balance ) end treatment .
